alert_replica_off: If you turn off the Copy option, this document is going to be inactivated. Are you sure you want to continue?
filter_group_user_acces: The user hasn't assignments but he has the group filter activated. This may result in not having access to the application.
filter_label_user_acces: The user hasn't labels assigned but he has the label filter activated. This may result in not having access to the application.
fremap_uid_usuario: The user who perform the tasks
expl_referenciar_contratacion: Reference this document requesting once per contract
alert_replica_off: If you turn off the Copy option, this document is going to be inactivated. Are you sure you want to continue?
filter_requirement_expl_comment: It is possible that some comments are not displayed
filter_requirement_expl_link_comment: Click here to show all the comments.
company_due_new_range: By signing up this element you will exceed the maximum of elements permitted by your license and the cost will be recalculated. For more information click here.
confirm_company_due_new_range: ¿Are you sure? Your premium license will no longer be valid until you renew it.
new_range_license:
You just exceed your licensed limit premium and you have to renew it.
For more information click.
trash_company_due_new_range: If you bring out some element from the trash you will exceed the maximum of elements permitted by your license and the cost will be recalculated. For more information click here.
download_file: You can download the file by clicking here.
no_requirement_for_document: Your client does not require this document anymore
rejected_update_date: The document has expired because the 48 hours of temporary validation have finished. The document is going to be in attached status when you update the date.
are_you_sure_to_proceed: Are you sure you want to continue?
expl_pay_for_contracts: The company just can assume the payments for those contracts which do not share with any other client.
expl_deadline_ok: Deadline for your contracts to sign up, upload the required documents and to have them validated.
error_falta_baja: The date cannot be lower or equal than today.
pending_invitation_days: You have a pending invitation since %s days ago from your client %s.
expiring_one_invitation: The invitation that you sent on %s to the company %s (%s: %s) has expired.
expl_how_to_reinvite_a_company: If you are still interested to have the company as a contract, you just need to go to dokify
expiring_several_invitation: Today they are going to expire %s invitations, they have been not accepted yet.
expl_how_to_reinvite_several_company: If you are still interested to have these companies as a contracts, you just need to go to dokify
continunation_expl_reinvite_company: and, from Companies, in the Invitations tab, resend the invitation.
client_deadline: Important: %s has set the date %s as the limit for you to upload all the documents required, in other case you won't be available to work for him.
plantillaemail_validacionurgente: It will be send when an user request a urgent validation
expl_uid_agrupamiento_condicion: If no gruping of this type is assigned to an item, this document won't be requested
pago_maps: If you want to enjoy all the maps features
desc_mostrar_mapa_menu: Show maps icon in the main menu
archivo_no_legible: The file is not readable or it is corrupted
renew_license_title: Do you want to renew Premium license? Remember that:
renew_license_premium_upload: You will have an upload capacity of 50MB per document
renew_license_premium_export: You will export information in excel and zip
renew_license_premium_employee: You will have access to the employee portal
renew_license_premium_phone: You will continue enjoying phone support from a national number
change_license_title: If you decide to change your license to free, consider that:
change_license_premium_upload: The upload capacity will be 3MB per document
change_license_premium_export: Phone suppot will be through a 807 number
change_license_premium_charge: Yow won't have express upload, you won't not be able to the same document to several clients
change_license_premium_phone: You will only have an unique user so, if you have more than one, you must to delete the rest
click_check_plans: Click here to check the characteristics of each plan
info_change_plans: If you still want to change your license, you can call us at (+34) 918 388 049 o send us an email to soporte@dokify.net.
archivo_no_legible: The file is not readable or it is corrupted
geolocate_user: Click here to add a location
completa_campo_direccion_continuar: Add an address for this address
should_select_company_docs: None of the selected companies are requesting documents. Probably you need to select one that has the icon
detected_problems_upload_file: It was a problem uploading the file. Please, try again.
download_requests_summary: Download in excel the cumplimentation summary
fecha_actualizada: The document date has been update successfully
search_reminder_text: We have detected you have the search %s configurated in the company %s and your user has been moved to the company %s. In order to receive the search in your email, you have to reconfigurate it again in your new company.
temporary_message: The document is going to be %s at %s
documento_validado_date: The document has been validated temporarily, the %s is going to be rejected definitely.
validation_urgent_employee_expl: The urgent validation will apply to the document %s and the employee %s.
view_company_criteria: Click here to be sure %s will validate your document!
expl_invoice_periodicity: In months, how often are sent invoices to this company. Does not apply to license payments.
validation_urgent_employee_expl: The urgent validation will apply to the document %s and the employee %s.
temporary_validated: The document has been validated temporarily
document_revision_delete: You´ve marked this document as reviewed. Click here to remove the review
remove_revision_text: If you want to remove the review of this document just click un the continue button. You can always mark it as reviewed later
confirmar_abandonar: Are you sure you want to exit?
confirmar_abandonar_visibilidad: Are you sure you want to exit without save the visibility?
opciones_trasnferencia_empleado: To transfer this employee to your company there are two options
enviar_alta_pdf: Please, send the document if PDF format
enviar_alta_original: The uploaded file doesnt seems to be a valid Social Security. You must send the original in PDF
alta_no_corresponde: The uploaded file is not valid for %s
error_municipio: Select the correct province for this municipality
need_terms: You need to learn the terms and conditions
something_went_wrong: An error ocurred, please try again later
no_request_found: It has not  been found any request
need_at_least_one_group: It needs al least one assignment to configure it
alert_mandatory_groups_needed_invitation: The invitation will not send because you did not assign at least one group of those organizations labeled as mandatory.
alert_mandatory_groups_needed_elements: There are some documents pending to be requested because you did not assign at least one group of those organizations labeled as mandatory.
mandatory_groups_needed: You must assign at least one group of this type
expl_mandatory_group: For those organizations labeled as compulsory you have to assign to the element, at least, one of each type.
has_pending_invitation: We are sorry but you already have an invitation pending for this company
choose_category_client: The type of company is a mandatory field
error_client_pay_option: The company must be Enterprise to assume contracts payment
expl_uid_agrupador_company_condicion: Group must be assigned to the item company to request this document
restrict_visibility_known_user: The user %s has restricted you visibility for this client.
restrict_visibility_unknown_user: An anonymous user has restricted you visibility for this client.
description_visibility_user:
Configure, for this user, those clients the user will be able to see documents.

The user will see the documents of the companies you will select below:
desc_visibility_client_user: Configure the visibility of the documents of your clients
email_aviso_eliminar_subscripcion: To stop receiving these emails, click here.
plantillaemail_anulacion: You'll receive this email if one of your documents is rejected.
plantillaemail_upload: You'll receive this email if a user upload a new file.
plantillaemail_citamedica: You'll receive this email each time a new medical appointment is received.
plantillaemail_aptitudmedica: You'll receive this email with the result of the medical appointment.
plantillaemail_subcontratacion: You'll receive this email when someone edit a contract chain.
plantillaemail_primercomentario: You'll receive this email with the first comment of each document you are requesting.
plantillaemail_estadoempresaok: You'll receive a weekly email if your company is up to date and correctly filled
plantillaemail_invoicenotification: You'll receive this email for each invoice event of dokify
summary_ok_title: You have nothing awaiting review. Congratulations!
summary_ok_message: All your requested documents are validated, the company ones, employees and machines. In the next 15 days you do not have any document due to expire, well done.
summary_error_title: There are elements that require your attention
summary_error_message: You have documents pending to review, that means, in the status Empty, Rejected or Expired. Click in the links below to correct them.
search_select_status: Select one document status at least
text_email_license_expire_today: Your license is expiring on %s, since then you will not be able to access to dokify. To get it again log in dokify and start enjoying all the services at dokify.
no_model_found: We cannot find the model corresponding to this report
need_configure_field: You need to configure the field:
loc_sinlicencia: Your username and password are correct, but your company has a pending payment
transfer_pending_accept: I know, but I need to do it now
transfer_pending_general: You can't manage employees or machines until we have received the transfer
transfer_pending_bulk_action: Sorry, there is a pending transfer and you can't use this functionallity until we have received the transfer
validation_target_docs: Which documents do you want to validate?
campo_usuario_no_valido: The user field is not valid
order_field: The Excel is going to be ordered by the first field
copy_to_example_not_template: The attachment at example option is only available for upload documents
copy_to_example_needs_example: The attachment at example option is only available with an example document selected
expl_labels_condition: The group where the document is replicated must has one labels assigned at least
default_date_criteria: This date corresponds to the first day of validity of document. Is used to calculate the expiration date.
do_you_want_grace_period: ¿Do you want to set a grace period?
expl_attach_multiple: Do you want allow to attach more than one request of this document at the same time?
loc_404_api_decathlon: We can't find your data in Decathlon eplanning
fixed_date: Error in the date of the document
fixed_date_argument: The date you have introduced when uploading the document was not correct. To speed up the process, we have modified the date for you and validated the document. Please, in the future remember to introduce the correct date of the document.
